---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update location"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/{LocationId}/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing location. Only include fields you want to modify - omitted fields will retain their current values.

**Address Handling:** If address fields are provided, the location's address will be updated. If the location doesn't have an address, one will be created.

**Custom Fields:** To update custom field values, set `UpdateCustomFields: true` and include the `CustomFieldValues` array with the fields to update.

**Note:** This endpoint uses POST method (not PUT/PATCH) following the IncidentIQ API convention.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"LocationId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Unique identifier of the location to update","example":"aa632d8d-486f-ed11-ade6-cc60c8b5ca80"},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication","example":"Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"},{"name":"ProductId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Product context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating a location. When creating, Name and LocationTypeId are required. When updating, only include fields you want to change.","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Location display name","example":"IncidentIQ Demo High School"},"Abbreviation":{"type":"string","description":"Short code or abbreviation for the location","example":"IIDHS"},"LocationTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the location type. Obtain available types from location type endpoints.","example":"16469164-bce0-42b1-be1c-49861087c499"},"LocationStatusTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the location status type (e.g., Active, Inactive)","example":"68f6543f-09a1-ec11-8619-f8e43b468024"},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Detailed description of the location","example":"Main high school facility serving grades 9-12"},"Notes":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Internal notes about the location (not visible to end users)","example":"Building renovated in 2023"},"IsReservable":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether rooms at this location can be reserved for events","default":false},"Street1":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Primary street address line. Setting this will create/update the location's address.","example":"100 Demo Street"},"Street2":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Secondary address line (suite, building, etc.)","example":"Building A"},"City":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"City name","example":"Atlanta"},"State":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"State or province code","example":"GA"},"Zip":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Postal/ZIP code","example":"30317"},"LogoId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Reference to an uploaded logo file for this location"},"FloorplanId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Reference to the primary floorplan file for this location"},"IsDuplicateRequest":{"type":"boolean","default":false,"description":"Set to true when intentionally creating a location with a name that may already exist"},"UpdateCustomFields":{"type":"boolean","default":false,"description":"Set to true to update custom field values included in this request"},"CustomFieldValues":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Custom field value specific to a location","properties":{"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Location this custom field value belongs to"},"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the custom field type definition"},"EditorTypeId":{"type":"integer","description":"Editor type for rendering the field (text, dropdown, date, etc.)"},"Value":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The custom field value as a JSON string"},"IsHidden":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this field is hidden from standard views"},"MappedProperties":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":true,"nullable":true,"description":"Additional mapped properties for complex field types"}},"required":["CustomFieldTypeId"],"title":"LocationCustomFieldValue"},"description":"Custom field values to set. Only processed if UpdateCustomFields is true."}},"required":["Name","LocationTypeId"],"title":"UpdateLocationRequest"},"example":{"Name":"IncidentIQ Demo High School - Main Campus","Description":"Main high school campus - updated description","IsReservable":true,"LocationTypeId":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
